home.subtitle: Welcome to the documentation of my career.

about.title: About me
about.presentation: I am a Brazilian native from João Pessoa, Paraíba, with a background in Computer Science, earned from UNIPE completed in 2024. Over the course of 4 years, I have acquired significant experience in programming. One of my strengths is my determination to achieve goals. I have a profound passion for technology and am committed to continuous learning and growth
about.educationText: During my course, I interned at Conte Cornetet and developed a system for oversight and service orders, focusing primarily on a real-time audio transcription system. I led the front-end development of a hospital shift management system at UNIPÊ. I gave a lecture on front-end development, taught a front-end workshop, and completed my thesis on the democratization of systems in Artificial Intelligence, using UX principles and enhancing the ROORE system, a prompt platform for AI.

career.title: My career
career.freelancerText: After acquiring sufficient knowledge in the field of programming, I seized the opportunity to engage in various freelance projects. Among them were: designing a webpage to showcase architectural projects for Trinity company and developing a presentation and registration page for new members of a shooting club in my city. These projects not only allowed me to apply my programming skills effectively but also provided valuable experience in meeting client requirements and delivering quality solutions tailored to their needs.
career.conteText: In 2023, I embarked on my first internships in real companies. The first one was at an architecture firm called Conte Cornetet Arquitetura, which was pivotal in solidifying my front-end knowledge. One of my key achievements at Conte involved developing a real-time audio transcription system to aid in the company's reports and inspections. In this project, I had the opportunity to explore new technologies and enhance my skills. The main front-end technologies used in the system were React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
career.gesplantaoText: Shortly after, I received an invitation to participate in another internship project simultaneously. This project was for the development of a shift management system for the medicine course at UNIPE, part of Cruzeiro do Sul University. In this system, I was responsible for dividing shift teams by subject, location, and allowing students to clock in using geolocation while at the workplace. In this project, I actively participated in leading the front-end team. The front-end technologies used in this project were React.js with Next.js.
career.btorText: In September 2023, I joined Btor Solucoes Computacionais as a front-end developer. I started as an intern and was later promoted to junior developer. At Btor, I had the opportunity to work with technologies that were new to me, allowing me to expand my overall programming knowledge. I worked with Flutter, Angular, and React, and also gained some exposure to C#. My time at Btor concluded in March 2024.
career.cotechText: I also worked as a freelance front-end developer for an enterprise management system, utilizing current market technologies such as React.js with the Next.js framework, styling with Tailwind CSS, and employing request methods like OData.
career.EnoqueProjectText: Furthermore, I actively participated in the development of a platform for enterprise and asset management, where I worked full-stack utilizing technologies such as ReactJS, NodeJS, NextJS, Express, TypeORM, and a PostgreSQL database. This allowed me to expand my skills in a full-stack environment, enabling the development of both visual aspects and all business logic and data management of the system.
career.timeAlign: January 2024 marked the beginning of my journey in developing a SAAS system for appointment management, named TimeAlign. This platform allows businesses to register, add their units and employees, and receive appointments from potential clients who utilize the platform. In this project, I took on the responsibility of handling the entire frontend, backend, and database of the application. I leveraged various market technologies such as ReactJs, Nodejs, Express, Typeorm, Stripe, and PostgreSQL. As of April 2024, the system is in its demo version, with an anticipated release in January 2025.
